an10.40:1: "Bhante, it is said: ‘Concord in the Saṅgha, concord in the Saṅgha.’ How is there concord in the Saṅgha?"
an10.40:2: "But, Bhante, when one reconciles a divided Saṅgha, what does one generate?"
an10.40:3: Pleasant is concord in the Saṅgha,and the mutual help[n.2042] I add the word "mutual" on the basis ofMp'sgloss:aññamaññassa saṅgahānuggaho.of those who live in concord.Delighting in concord, established in Dhamma,one does not fall away from security from bondage.Having brought concord to the Saṅgha,one rejoices in heaven for an eon.
